root.name: Sprocket Junkie
root.description: Sprocket Junkie is a fun and fast paced multiplayer vehicular combat game that straps riders onto customizable rocket engines with grapple guns mounted on either side. These grapple hooks are fired at opponents to yank them off of their rockets, set up rope clotheslines, and make hairpin turns. Players will find power-ups and traps in each arena that they can use to gain the edge over the other competitors.
